abstract: William A. Ackman's hedge fund, Pershing Square Capital Management, disclosed late Friday that it had acquired a 12.2 percent stake in Canadian Pacific.
snippet: William A. Ackman's hedge fund, Pershing Square Capital Management, disclosed late Friday that it had acquired a 12.2 percent stake in Canadian Pacific.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire hedge fund manager William A. Ackman has been working on the railroad -- in particular, the Canadian Pacific Railway.

headline.main: Ackman Takes a Ride on the Canadian Pacific Railway
